name: Card Match Zen Uno Game
description:
Remove the cards of same color or same value to clear the field and win.

Every layout is a unique mix of colored cards that have a value. This game is bringing a fresh puzzle mechanic for you to enjoy!

Gameplay is simple and deep at the same time.

THERE IS NO ADS OR IAP. ONLY FUN.

Features:
• Play in one tap
• Many layouts
• Fast and tricky
• Juicy visuals
• Satisfying action
• Efficient Battery usage
• Tons of levels

WARNING! Extremely addictive.
